name: Pururun! with Shape Up Girls
overview: Pururun! With Shape UP Girls is a breakout puzzle game that features more than 100 stages. The game is endorsed by the popular japanese music group Shape Up Girls (they began their career in the year 1994 and they had released some cds). The game features movies and photographs of the girls. The goal is to clear all the bricks in each stage to advance to the next one. The game features an unlockable pictures and movie gallery and 3 difficulties modes.
